Windows Server 2003 SP2 Administration Tools Pack Available

Jan 16, 2008 Aaron Parker

The Service Pack 2 Administration Tools pack has been released as a stand alone package. I’m fairly certain this is new - I don’t recall seeing this download before and the knowledgebase article was updated just yesterday.

  • Windows Server 2003 Service Pack 2 Administration Tools Pack for x86 editions
  • Windows Server 2003 Service Pack 2 Administration Tools Pack for x64 editions
  • How to use the Administration Tools Pack to remotely administer computers that are running Windows Server 2003, Windows XP, or Windows 2000
